name: Ma(t)ch Speed
description:
Install instructions

Hello! Welcome to the Mach Speed Racing Program! 

 The goal is simple, to reach Mach Speed! (1232 km/h)

Collect Shards of the same colour to increase your speed.

 Move with A-D or Left and Right Arrows.

 That's it, have fun!

 Assets used:

 Music: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/electronic/super-eurobeat-pack...

 Sound effects: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/sound-fx-retro-pack-121743
